ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
ygData.msgSnippet: Update Drivers, Video and Audio. Close all programs running in background. (I have to do this with my PC) Cant think of anything else. Mu ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Update Drivers, Video and Audio.
Close all programs running in background. (I have to do this with my PC)

Cant think of anything else.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Miewald@...
[mailto:John_Miewald@...]
Sent: Friday, May 25, 2001 12:12 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On



I have a friend who is having an unusually difficult time signing on and
staying online. It seems that just about any time she zones, you can
assume she will not be on anymore.

Is this a common problem? Does anyone have some "quick fix" ideas that
might keep her from being punted so easily?

Thanks for any help.

"Alazais"


Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
